title: (x) Neil Young square sans - Binerstyle/Report {Ignacio}
content:
The closest I could get was Agency FB condensed, but it’s a little off.

TIA

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219010152im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/neil-young_5583.gif)

 [‹ (x) "rsiva" italic/script - Bellevue (modified) {Jan E}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219010152/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38184 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) wedding invitation - Copperplate Gothic, Caflisch Script {Jan E, Florian} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219010152/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38176 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Paul Cutler

comments.content:
Thanks Ignacio - I think Report Bold from that thread nailed it, although there wasn’t a sample of the all the letters.

Luckily the asset was large enough to get a really good Live Trace out of it. Making a banner that is 80’ wide so rasterized type is not an option… :)

pbc
